name: Logical Media Group
tagline: Providing clean and simple web design in Chicago
description:
Logical Media Group's mission is to craft exceptional digital experiences for people and companies to transact, connect, and explore. Logical accomplishes this through capabilities in web design, paid media (search + social), & search engine optimization (SEO). Logical also has expertise in Amazon marketing, Google Analytics configurations, and improving a website's ability to convert (CRO).
Logical Media Group acquired The Ocean Agency in November 2014. For ~5 years, Logical operated under both brands. As of March 2019, we now operate as simply 'Logical'.
